name: Bowly World 2: A ball's Shadow
description:
After Mr. Pins recent defeat, he stumbles upon an ancient temple. Out of curiosity he explores the area and accidentally releases the Shadow lord. Now the two worlds, bowly world and the shadow world, are slowly merging. To stop the merging Bowly steps up along with his shadow counterpart to stop Mr. Pin and The shadow lord.

Experience Bowly World in a new way with New features: 

The double Jump - Bowly and his shadow counterpart can jump one more time after their initial first jump, Allowing them to cross greater distances in the air! 

Defeating enemies - A brand new feature ( That should have been present in the original game ) that allows you to defeat enemies by jumping on them.

The Shadow Run - A mode found in the level select ( Which is easier to access now ) that allows you to play all the Shadow levels.

The Character Manual -  Meet the cast of Bowly World with the NEW Character Manual.
